name: setParticipantLimit(_:forWaitingOutSuspensionsWithReason:)
desc: Sets a limit on the number of partipants that a group may contain before the coordinator stops waiting on suspensions that occur for a particular reason.
declaration:
func setParticipantLimit(_ participantLimit: Int, 
forWaitingOutSuspensionsWithReason reason: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason)
